sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import MetaData from '../layout/MetaData' import Loader from '../layout/Loader' import Sidebar from './Sidebar' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getAdminProducts } from '../../actions/productActions' import { allOrders } from '../../actions/orderActions' import { allUsers } from '../../actions/userActions' const Dashboard = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { products: _products } = useSelector(state => state.products) const { user } = useSelector(state => state.auth) const { orders: _orders, totalAmount, loading } = useSelector(state => state.allOrders) const orders = useMemo(() => { if (!user || !user._id) return _products return _orders?.filter(item => item.user === user._id) || [] }, [user._id, _orders]) const products = useMemo(() => { if (!user || !user._id) return _products return _products.filter(item => item.user === user._id) }, [user._id, _products]) let outOfStock = 0; products.forEach(product => { if (product.stock === 0) { outOfStock += 1; } }) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getAdminProducts()) dispatch(allOrders()) dispatch(allUsers()) }, [dispatch]) return (

Dashboard

{loading ? : (
Total Amount
${totalAmount && totalAmount.toFixed(2)}
Products
{products && products.length}
View Details
Orders
{orders && orders.length && orders.filter(item => item.orderStatus === "Processing").length}
View Details
{/*
Users
{users && users.length}
View Details
*/}
Out of Stock
{outOfStock}
 )}
) } export default Dashboard
